trans-unit.source: Handles configuration settings for XML serialization of <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> instances.
trans-unit.target: Lida com as definições de configuração para a serialização de XML de instâncias de <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.

trans-unit.source: This class handles the configuration element [<dateTimeSerialization> Element](~/docs/standard/serialization/datetimeserialization-element.md) found under the [<system.xml.serialization> Element](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-xml-serialization-element.md).
trans-unit.target: Essa classe gerencia o elemento de configuração [ <dateTimeSerialization> elemento](~/docs/standard/serialization/datetimeserialization-element.md) encontrado sob o [ <Serialization> elemento](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-xml-serialization-element.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about configuration files, see [Configuration File Schema](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre arquivos de configuração, consulte [Esquema de arquivos de configuração](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/index.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Configuration.DateTimeSerializationSection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Configuration.DateTimeSerializationSection" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines the serialization format.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que determina o formato de serialização.

trans-unit.source: This property is used when handling the `mode` attribute of the [<dateTimeSerialization> Element](~/docs/standard/serialization/datetimeserialization-element.md).
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é usada ao tratar o `mode` atributo do [ <dateTimeSerialization> elemento](~/docs/standard/serialization/datetimeserialization-element.md).
